title: 【临时工搬运】中世纪小房子-Medieval Mondays #3: Small House
author: 筒子
txt_content:
中世纪小房子Medieval Mondays #3: Small House

Hey there! Guess what, it's monday again - welcome to the third Medieval Mondays build!As for today, I chose to go for a small, rather poor house; there's some little holes, cobwebs, dirt or missing things to the house here and there. Again, the building is completely furnished, which was by the way quite a challenge considering the fact that the house really is small so the space to add furniture is limited. However I still prefer small interiors over the big ones which you have to fill huge empty space to actually achieve something good-looking.The list below represents the builds that I'd like to cover in this series. The ones marked blue are thsoe that I've already built - click on it to check them out![book]简单介绍[book]嘿！基佬，猜猜看，它又是在星期一发布-欢迎来到第三中世纪周一建造！今天，我选择了做一个小而差的房子；有一些小洞，蜘蛛网，灰尘或丢失的东西在这里。建筑需要完善的内饰，这是相当大的挑战，考虑到房子真的很小所以空间增添家具。不过我还是更喜欢小房子，如果太大你就必须填补巨大的空的空间才能实现一些好看的效果。[diamond_gem]搬运理由[diamond_gem]那个作者的每一个建筑都像是一个小玩具一样颜色搭配非常的漂亮，各种细节也是让人非常的舒服我非常喜欢这种风格的建筑

replies.author: 小伟0.0
replies.txt_content: 发个视频弄建筑教程就好了，可以在服务器里弄了{:10_565:}

replies.author: 布鲁多
replies.txt_content: 我记得作者发出的schematics文件在mcedit上好像和第一张图片的方块有些不同，比如阳台下的两根柱子，并不是石栅栏而是圆石

replies.author: Police_
replies.txt_content: 元素少了一些 不过不错
